entry.title: JP Morgan Activates Euro Payment Settlement With Its JPM Coin
entry.summary: Four years in, the financial giant's JPM Coin has been used internally to settle about $300 billion in payments.

entry.title: 'Don’t Over-Web3 It': VaynerSports Gaming VP's Advice to Content Creators
entry.summary: Darren Glover, who manages popular streamers, shares his perspective on how content creators can navigate Web3 without alienating gamers.

entry.title: It Will Get Harder to Detect Deepfakes: Secta Labs CEO
entry.summary: While deepfakes are easy to detect today, Marko Jak says, "We're getting into an era where we can no longer believe what we see."

entry.title: FTX Sues to Reclaim $700M Bankman-Fried Allegedly Spent on Celebrity Connections
entry.summary: A new lawsuit alleges that Bankman-Fried threw cash “super-networker” Michael Kives, a Hollywood agent turned investor and ex-aide to Hillary Clinton.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Rally Hard Post-BlackRock
entry.summary: Also, the British parliament is now very nearly in accord over a bill of proposed crypto regulation.

entry.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
entry.summary: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

entry.title: Cross the Ages Beginner's Guide: How to Play the NFT Card-Battler
entry.summary: Get up to speed quickly with this complex collectible card game, which isn’t your typical Hearthstone clone.

entry.title: South Korean Mobile Carrier KT to Invest $5.3 Billion Into AI by 2027
entry.summary: KT Corporation, formerly Korea Telecom, has a plan to invest $5.3 billion to offer AI services in fields ranging from education to robotics.

entry.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.

entry.title: Cloud9, G2 Among Esports Giants to Showcase 'Sparkball' in Tournament
entry.summary: Worldspark Studios will hold a Sparkball competition Saturday with major esports teams ahead of the early access launch.

entry.title: Stable Diffusion Gets an Upgrade—Here’s How Its AI Model Stacks Up Against MidJourney
entry.summary: Stable Diffusion XL v0.9 is out. And the results are impressive.

entry.title: Gmoney in Paris: How Emerging Tech Is Redefining Luxury Fashion
entry.summary: 9dcc founder gmoney discussed the impact of NFTs on the fashion industry during his Paris Men's Fashion Week event with Jeff Staple.

entry.title: SEC Approves First Leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF
entry.summary: The Volatility Shares 2x Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITX) is scheduled to launch on the Chicago Board Options (CBOE) BZX Exchange next Tuesday, June 27th.

entry.title: Bitcoin Touches $31,000 as BlackRock Rally Continues
entry.summary: The world's largest and oldest cryptocurrency has come a long way after starting the year below $17,000.

entry.title: Will Elon Musk Fight Mark Zuckerberg in a Cage? You Can Bet on It
entry.summary: As a potential battle between Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg looms, crypto gamblers are placing bets via Polymarket.

entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Praises Bitcoin, Says CBDCs Are 'Instruments of Control'
entry.summary: In a recent interview with New York Post, Kennedy added that CBDCs "are certain to be abused.”

entry.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Prices Are Plunging—Why?
entry.summary: Traders suggest that airdrop farming for the Blur marketplace token is having a negative effect on Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT floor prices.

entry.title: IMF Capitulates on Bitcoin Bans, Says They're Not Effective
entry.summary: The IMF is now suggesting that crypto bans may not be the best move after previously saying that countries should consider it.

entry.title: Yuga Labs Is Writing the Book on CryptoPunks—Literally
entry.summary: The history of the CryptoPunks NFT project will get its own physical tome as Yuga and Zak Group tap the community for an official book.

entry.title: Coinbase Wins Supreme Court's Favor in Arbitration Dispute
entry.summary: Justices voted 5-4 in the ruling.

entry.title: Spain Gives Crypto.com Green Light to Set Up Shop
entry.summary: The Singapore-based platform will now be able to offer its services in Spain.

entry.title: These Are The High-Profile Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications Currently In Play
entry.summary: Bitcoin exchange-traded funds have sprung up around the world—but the U.S. SEC continues to stonewall proposals for a Bitcoin spot ETF.

entry.title: Cryptopay Loses EMI License, Urges EU Customers to Spend or Transfer Card Funds Immediately
entry.summary: Following the company's loss of its EMI license in Europe, Cryptopay assured users that funds held in the app’s accounts are secure.

entry.title: SEC to Forego BlockFi’s Outstanding $30 Million Penalty—For Now
entry.summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission has agreed to let BlockFi’s investors go to the front of the claims queue.

entry.title: German Intelligence Agency’s Dogs of BND Collection Mints Out
entry.summary: The NFT collection was launched as part of a drive to recruit crypto and blockchain experts to Germany’s BND.

entry.title: Amazon Pledges $100 Million for Generative AI Startups
entry.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has introduced a fund of $100 million to bolster startups focusing on generative AI.

entry.title: SAP Clients Testing Circle’s USDC to Fix Cross-Border Payment ‘Hassle’
entry.summary: The software giant is using a "play money" version of the stablecoin to help clients test out sending money overseas.

entry.title: Hackers Leak Over 100,000 ChatGPT Credentials on the Dark Web
entry.summary: The theft of the ChatGPT login credentials was orchestrated using the Raccoon Infostealer malware, said cybersecurity firm Group-IB.

entry.title: FC Barcelona, World of Women Reveal 'Empowerment' Soccer NFT Auction
entry.summary: The Spanish soccer icon's latest NFT play is artwork inspired by women's club captain Alexia Putellas, with real-world perks for the buyer.

entry.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation
entry.summary: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.

entry.title: You Can Earn Bitcoin for Playing Over 100 Android Games
entry.summary: Zebedee’s app now supports popular mobile games—including Dragon City and Slotomania—that pay Bitcoin for each minute you play.

entry.title: A New Bitcoin Mining Giant Prepares to Enter the Fray
entry.summary: Once Hut 8 and U.S. Bitcoin Corp. complete their merger, the resulting U.S.-based company will be one of the largest public miners in North America.

entry.title: Degens Have Bet $170K in Crypto on Missing Titanic Submarine Being Found
entry.summary: As the submarine drama unfolds, crypto gamblers on Polymarket are betting on whether the manned vessel will be found by the end of Friday.

entry.title: BitGo Cancels Prime Trust Acquisition, Users Report Frozen Withdrawals
entry.summary: Crypto custodian BitGo announced it was ending talks to acquire rival Prime Trust, ending the acquistion two weeks after it was announced.

entry.title: Three Arrows Co-Founders Are Back With a New VC Fund. Is Anyone Buying?
entry.summary: The co-founders of the bankrupt crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital (3AC) are launching a new investment venture.

entry.title: Ethereum Micropayments Solution Volition Aims to Make 'Crypto for Coffee Transactions Viable'
entry.summary: StarkWare’s novel scaling functionality, Volition, promises to make it possible to reduce Ethereum gas fees by up to 90%.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner CleanSpark Claims Two Georgia Facilities For $9.3 Million
entry.summary: The facilities are expected to add nearly 1 exahash per second to CleanSpark's bitcoin mining capacity.

entry.title: Anichess Raises $1.5 Million to Put Magical Twist on Chess
entry.summary: Animoca Brands’ inventive play-and-earn riff on chess is supported by Chess.com and due to roll out in 2024.

entry.title: Atomic Wallet Claims 'Less Than 0.1%' of Users Affected by $100M Hack
entry.summary: The Atomic Wallet team reported that they are working to recover the funds, but would not confirm how much money was stolen in the attack.

entry.title: Ripple Has Played Its Hinman Hand—Could It Help Coinbase?
entry.summary: How will the revelations in the Hinman emails play out for Ripple and Coinbase in their SEC court battles? Legal experts weigh in.

entry.title: PEPE's 79% Weekly Gains Lead Meme Coin Surge as DOGE, SHIB, FLOKI Up Double Digits
entry.summary: The meme coin sector posted impressive gains as market sentiment turned positive with Bitcoin’s breakout above $30,000.

entry.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.

entry.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.

entry.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler
entry.summary: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.

entry.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead
entry.summary: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.

entry.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan
entry.summary: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.

entry.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.

entry.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit
entry.summary: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.

entry.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO
entry.summary: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.

entry.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.

entry.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming
entry.summary: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.

entry.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP
entry.summary: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.

entry.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG
entry.summary: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.

entry.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth
entry.summary: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.

entry.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset
entry.summary: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.

entry.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil
entry.summary: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel
entry.summary: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.

entry.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Super-fan Base’: Superduper Co-founder
entry.summary: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand Superduper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.
